newsitem.title: USA: Dow firm, Nasdaq reverses gains.
newsitem.headline: Dow firm, Nasdaq reverses gains.

text.p: U.S. blue chips rose higher Tuesday, carrying the Dow well past the 7500 mark before consolidating their recent gains.
In early afternoon trading, the Dow industrials were up 52 points at 7530 after skimming past 7572 this morning.
The Nasdaq Composite fell back into negative territory, shedding 6.18, or 0.44 percent, to 1406.
The long bond slipped, down 2/32 to yield 6.83 percent. The Standard & Poor's futures index was up 0.65 to 866.50.
